TextBlock.Text: Lotus: What are these supposed to be?
Kestrel: Can't say for sure. This one is sealed, too.
Lotus: Why isn't there any signs of intelligent life other than these? You'd think they'd have some form of shelter, or anything at all?
Kestrel: Surely there's something else. I'll check on Solara's progress with the signal hijacker, you should continue to investigate the rest of these.
